name: Fruit Fight (ElbiBeck, SkidoodleMan666, DoomMeow)
description:
Click F11 to fullscreen the game after clicking Run Game.

Team: ElbiBeck, SkidoodleMan66 and DoomMeow.

Everyone helped with the programing, and gamedesign. SkidoodleMan66 and DoomMeow made the pixelart using Photoshop and Aseprite. Fonts from Google-Fonts. The rest of the assets is unity default assets.

Tools used: Unity Game Engine, Github, Photoshop and Aseprite.

The game is made for Mini Jam 71 - Puzzles with the limitation "Combine 2 genres". Our game combines a classic topdown shooter, with cooking/crafting mechanics. The puzzles element is incorporated in how you need to figure out the recipes for the weapons you want/need for your fight.
